QuestData.Title: Off With Her Head
QuestData.Description:
Warmother Nagla is driving her forces with a brutality and strength we did not expect.
Blood trolls desecrate all dey touch, and are preparing to wreak havoc on all dat remain.
As dey say, "cut off de head, and de beast will be dead".
I will have her head as a trophy to show dat our brothers were avenged!
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: Vicious and bloodthirsty leader of the war camp.
QuestData.LogDescription: Bring back the head of Warmother Nagla.
